# Adhwaith K P - Student Developer Portfolio

## About
Adhwaith K P is a Student Developer and Creative Coder based in Kerala, India. He specializes in Full-Stack Web Development, primarily using the React and Next.js ecosystem.

## Skills
- **Languages**: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C/C++, SQL
- **Frameworks**: Next.js, React, Express.js, Tailwind CSS
- **Tools**: Git, GitHub, Vercel, Firebase, MongoDB

## Projects
- **Portfolio**: This website, showcasing his work and skills.
- **Various Open Source Experiments**: Available on GitHub.

## Contact
- **Email**: adhwaithK P@gmail.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/adhu1010
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/adhwaithprasannan
- **Twitter**: https://twitter.com/_adhu46

## Content Structure
- `/`: Main landing page with Hero, About, Skills, Experience, Projects, and Contact sections.
- `/resume`: Direct link to view/download resume.
